PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-09662009-06-11,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActPension Benefits Standards Act, 1985
SubjectCanadian Press Pension Plan Solvency Deficiency Funding Regulations
PrecisWill defer special pension payments owed by the Canadian Press to its two defined benefit pension plans until October 2010 in order to permit the company time to effect a restructuring from a not-for-profit structure to a for-profit entity.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0183 Publication Date: 2009-06-24
AttachmentsAttachment
